serviceprofile.title: Proposed FMN Spiral 4 Text-Based Collaboration Services Metadata Labelling Serviceprofile

description.para: The Text-Based Collaboration Services Metadata Labelling Profile describes how to apply standard Metadata to Text-Based Collaboration Services.
The STANAGs and binding profiles describe the syntax and mechanisms for applying Metadata.
The STANAG describes the syntax for NATO Core Metadata.

guide.para: The structure of the binding is defined in Annex C of TN-1491.
The labelling Values shall be based on the Security Policy defined for the Mission.
